content:
Indulge in our award-winning Traditional Afternoon Tea service. Savor our Tiffin & Tea service featuring a selection of small bites and homemade sweets with Indian & Taj flair.

 

Be entertained by shows featuring the brightest stars of Broadway and Jazz. Learn more about our upcoming performances here.

Take in our quarterly series exhibiting the works of local artists, now showcasing  Jasmina Danowski's Living The Dream through February 17, 2019.

Explore Two E's elegant interior with a 360-degree virtual tour.
